text: Jorge Herrera Delgado (16 August 1961 â€“ 24 November 2014) was a Mexican politician. He was Mayor of Durango from 2004-2007, and twice deputy in the Durango State Congress. He served as head of the Durango Department of Education from 15 September 2010 to 7 February 2012. Delgado died on 24 November 2014 from pancreatic cancer in Durango at the age of 53. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:People from Durango Category:Mexican mayors Category:Mexican politicians
title: Jorge Herrera Delgado
